heading: HR02346
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION, IN THE EXERCISE OF ITS OVERSIGHT FUNCTIONS, TO REVIEW AND STUDY THE GRAVE IMPACT OF IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS (IRR) NO. 3.0 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10879 OR AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE SOUTHWESTERN TAGALOG REGION TO BE KNOWN AS THE MIMAROPA REGION THAT MANDATE THE TRANSFER OF REGIONAL GOVERNMENT OFFICES TO CALAPAN CITY
status: Pending with the Committee on RULES since 2018-12-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02346
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, THROUGH THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION, IN THE EXERCISE OF ITS OVERSIGHT FUNCTIONS, TO REVIEW AND STUDY THE GRAVE IMPACT OF IMPLEMENTING RULES AND REGULATIONS (IRR) NO. 3.0 OF REPUBLIC ACT NO. 10879 OR AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE SOUTHWESTERN TAGALOG REGION TO BE KNOWN AS THE MIMAROPA REGION THAT MANDATE THE TRANSFER OF REGIONAL GOVERNMENT OFFICES TO CALAPAN CITY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.
DATE FILED : 2018-12-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
